file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 34-61-05-04 - FMS JOYSTICK - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL FMS JOYSTICK - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH FMS HONEYWELL AND JOYSTICK INSTALLED 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the FMS Joystick. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH FMS HONEYWELL AND 34-61-05-000-802-A FMS JOYSTICK - REMOVAL JOYSTICK INSTALLED AIRCRAFT WITH FMS HONEYWELL AND 34-61-05-400-802-A FMS JOYSTICK - INSTALLATION JOYSTICK INSTALLED EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 34-61-05 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 34-61-05-000-802-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH FMS HONEYWELL AND JOYSTICK INSTALLED 2. FMS JOYSTICK - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the FMS Joystick. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 20-13-10-000-801-A/400 CONTROL PANELS - REMOVAL (TYPICAL) C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) (Aircraft with single FMS) On the circuit breaker panel, open the CMPTR (Location tip: DC BUS 1/NAV/CMPTR) circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (2) (Aircraft with dual FMS) On the Overhead Circuit breaker panel, open the circuit breakers below and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to them: • CHANNEL 1 (Location tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 1/STALL PROT/CHANNEL 1). • SHAKER 1 (Location tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 1/STALL PROT/SHAKER 1). • CHANNEL 2 (Location tip: DC BUS 2/STALL PROT/CHANNEL 2). • SHAKER 2 (Location tip: DC BUS 2/STALL PROT/SHAKER 2). • PUSHER CLUTCH (Location tip: DC BUS 2/STALL PROT/PUSHER CLUTCH). • FMS1 (Location tip: DC BUS 1/NAV/FMS1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 34-61-05 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) (Aircraft with dual FMS) On the right power control/distribution box, open the PUSHER MOTOR circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the panel (1) with the joystick (2) installed to get access to the electrical connections (3), refer to AMM task Control Panels - Removal AMM TASK 20-13-10-000-801-A/400. (2) Unsolder the electrical connections (3) from the joystick (2). (3) Push the joystick (3) and remove it from the panel (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 34-61-05 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH FMS HONEYWELL AND JOYSTICK INSTALLED Joystick - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONES 223 224 DET. A B 1. PANEL 2 C 1 C 2. JOYSTICK 3. ELECTRICAL DET. C CONNECTIONS DET. B 1 AIRCRAFT WITH SINGLE FMS. 2 AIRCRAFT WITH DUAL FMS. EM145AMM341047A.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 34-61-05 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 34-61-05-400-802-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH FMS HONEYWELL AND JOYSTICK INSTALLED 3. FMS JOYSTICK - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the FMS Joystick. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 20-13-10-400-801-A/400 CONTROL PANELS - INSTALLATION (TYPICAL) WM 20-30-00 - WM 34-61-50 - WM 34-62-50 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Insert the joystick (3) into the panel (1). (2) (Aircraft with single FMS) Solder the electrical connections (3) to the joystick (2), refer to Aircraft Wiring Manual (WM 34-61-50) and to Soldering Procedures (WM 20-30-00). (3) (Aircraft with dual FMS) Solder the electrical connections (3) to the joystick (2), refer to Aircraft Wiring Manual (WM 34-62-50) and to Soldering Procedures (WM 20-30-00). (4) To install the panel (1), refer to AMM task Control Panels - Install AMM TASK 20-13-10-400-801-A/400. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-802-A/400 34-61-05 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) (Aircraft with single FMS) On the circuit breaker panel, close the CMPTR (Location tip: DC BUS 1/NAV/CMPTR) circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from it. (2) (Aircraft with dual FMS) On the Overhead Circuit breaker panel, close the circuit breakers below and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from them: • CHANNEL 1 (Location tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 1/STALL PROT/CHANNEL 1). • SHAKER 1 (Location tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 1/STALL PROT/SHAKER 1). • CHANNEL 2 (Location tip: DC BUS 2/STALL PROT/CHANNEL 2). • SHAKER 2 (Location tip: DC BUS 2/STALL PROT/SHAKER 2). • PUSHER CLUTCH (Location tip: DC BUS 2/STALL PROT/PUSHER CLUTCH). • FMS1 (Location tip: DC BUS 1/NAV/FMS1). (3) (Aircraft with dual FMS) On the right power control/distribution box, close the PUSHER MOTOR circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from it. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-802-A/400 34-61-05 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
